sx.blah.discord.api.internal

Class DiscordClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.api.internal.DiscordClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDiscordClient

    public final class DiscordClientImpl
extends Object
implements IDiscordClient
    Defines the client. This class receives and sends messages, as well as holds our user data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient

        IDiscordClient.Image

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected EventDispatcher dispatcher
      Event dispatcher.
      protected String email
      Private copy of the email you logged in with.
      protected List<IGuild> guildList
      Local copy of all guilds/servers.
      protected long heartbeat
      Time (in ms) between keep alive messages.
      protected boolean isReady
      Whether the api is logged in.
      protected long lastSequence
      Caches the last operation done by the websocket, required for handling redirects.
      protected User ourUser
      User we are logged in as
      protected String password
      Private copy of the password you used to log in.
      protected List<IPrivateChannel> privateChannels
      All of the private message channels that the bot is connected to.
      protected List<IRegion> REGIONS
      Caches the available regions for discord.
      protected String sessionId
      The websocket session id.
      protected long timer
      Used for keep alive.
      protected String token
      Our token, so we can send XHR to Discord.
      protected DiscordWS ws
      WebSocket over which to communicate with Discord.

    • Field Detail

      • timer

        protected volatile long timer
        Used for keep alive. Keeps last time (in ms) that we sent the keep alive so we can accurately time our keep alive messages.

        User we are logged in as

      • updatePresence

        public void updatePresence(boolean isIdle,
                           Optional<String> game)
        Description copied from interface: IDiscordClient
        Updates the bot's presence.
        Specified by:
        updatePresence in interface IDiscordClient
        Parameters:
        isIdle - If true, the bot will be "idle", otherwise the bot will be "online".
        game - The optional name of the game the bot is playing. If empty, the bot simply won't be playing a game.
